body:
I've been attempting to use the [viglesiasce/helm-gcs](https://github.com/viglesiasce/helm-gcs) plugin to manage a private chart repo on Google Cloud Storage. That plugin implements a [very simple downloader](https://github.com/viglesiasce/helm-gcs/blob/master/bin/gcs-repo.sh) for the `gs://` protocol. From what I can tell, this is implemented correctly per the Helm docs on [downloader plugins](https://docs.helm.sh/using_helm/#downloader-plugins).

When I run: `helm repo add gcs-repo gs://the-dyrt-helm-charts`

It fails with: `Error: Looks like "gs://the-dyrt-helm-charts" is not a valid chart repository or cannot be reached: Get gs://the-dyrt-helm-charts/index.yaml: unsupported protocol scheme "gs"`

It seems like Helm is finding the custom `gs://` downloader, since other invalid protocol schemes fail with a different message: `Error: Could not find protocol handler for foo`

Digging around in the Helm source, I think the error is coming from trying to use an HTTP getter instead of the custom getter when fetching the index here: 
https://github.com/kubernetes/helm/blob/1a55161a53345816d724e1df9664f789113e1328/pkg/repo/chartrepo.go#L122

It looks like this always-HTTP behavior was introduced in #3206 when authentication support was added for remote repos. Before that change, the index download was done using the repo's instantiated client as expected.

---

Output of `helm version`:

```
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.9.0-rc4", GitCommit:"030d2c066bcf5a37931e0169b7921f3758d97095", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.9.0-rc4", GitCommit:"030d2c066bcf5a37931e0169b7921f3758d97095", GitTreeState:"clean"}
```

* Also tested on v2.9.0-rc3 and v2.8.2.

Output of `kubectl version`:

```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9", GitVersion:"v1.9.6", GitCommit:"9f8ebd171479bec0ada837d7ee641dec2f8c6dd1", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-03-21T15:21:50Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9+", GitVersion:"v1.9.6-gke.0", GitCommit:"cb151369f60073317da686a6ce7de36abe2bda8d", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-03-21T19:01:20Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3b4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

Cloud Provider/Platform (AKS, GKE, Minikube etc.): 

GKE

---

Mentioning https://github.com/viglesiasce/helm-gcs/issues/3 for a cross-issue link.
title: Downloader plugins not used when downloading new repo's index.yaml
